description: Convolution of Bell numbers with themselves.
comments: Equals row sums of triangle A144155. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 12 2008
links: Adam M. Goyt and Lara K. Pudwell, Avoiding colored partitions of two elements in the pattern sense, arXiv preprint arXiv:1203.3786 [math.CO], 2012. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 17 2012
maple: with(combinat):a:= n-> add(bell(i)*bell(n-i), i=0..n):seq(a(n), n=0..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 13 2014
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[BellB[k] BellB[n-k], {k, 0, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 17 2016 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
